title: Relationships
description: A list of relationships between this entity (subject) and various other entities (objects)

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the relationship (e.g. 'is a', 'has a', 'knows', 'trusts', etc.)

qualifier.title: Qualifier
qualifier.description: A qualifier for the relationship (e.g. 'is a' could be qualified with 'former member', 'current member', etc.)

object_url.title: Object URL
object_url.description: The URL (starting with http:// or https://) that links to the receiving entity of the described relationship, and is ideally its Primary URL

metadata.purpose: Relationships describe the links between the subject entity and various other entities, describing their relationships in a human-readable way. The object_url should be the Primary URL of the receiving entity, and the description should be a short description of the relationship (e.g. 'is a', 'has a', 'knows', 'trusts', etc.). The qualifier is optional, and can be used to further qualify the relationship (e.g. 'is a' could be qualified with 'former member', 'current member', etc.).
